title: How do I report a booster?
body:
: 英雄联盟LOL 美服 澳服 韩服 台服 欧服 新加坡服 日服 代练.青铜-大师 陪练.拜师.定位赛 价格优惠 诚信接单 qq:409878054   微信(wechat):18268542742 skype: (live:409878054)  support：支付宝 Paypal 微信 visa payment  challenger rank elo boosting, duo-queue b

got this message in chat after getting stomped by a shaco idkif he is boosting but this should be followed up.

replies.body: As Rocka said, send in a ticket to [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and include any evidence you (may) have (a screenshot of the chat logs, if possible, would help the process along, though not necessary). You'll get a generic response about how they'll "investigate the issue and can't inform you of any actions taken", this is normal and *doesn't* necessarily mean nothing will be done.
I had the enemy mid laner offer discounts in after game chat after I lost a rather one sided game about a week ago. He was promising Plat and higher.
put all that into google and found this http://www.lollong.com/ i think you might be right there
